about1:
I'm a Freelance Graphics developer
specialized in WebGL/WebGPU.
about2:
I make Award winning Websites, Games and
Installations for Agencies
around the world.
about3:

selection of the things I made.

the Golden Underpants in
this little browser game
lab101:
Together with Kris Meeusen of Lab101, I make
low overhead/ high quality Interactive Installations
for museums and events all over the world.
Check out his website for more info.
arduinoGame:
A free to play game for anyone
that passes by my house.
Running on an arduino and
a home made ledscreen.
instructions:
Use arrow keys and spacebar
or use your favorite controller
